name: places/ChIJIf6U8JdYwokROHEg-UpTODM
adrFormatAddress: 1045 5th Ave #1a, New York, NY 10028-0138, USA

originalText.text: I have had a great experience with Fifth Avenue Fertility and continue to do so. You never feel like just a number there, but rather a special individual who is looked at in whole and not just statistically according to age or other factors of the sort. The environment of the office is so relaxed and calming, you feel like you are sitting in a beautiful brownstone rather then a Dr office. I don't think I've ever been in the waiting area with more then just one other person at a time and often I was the only one waiting. I always appreciated that they did not overbook appointments, again giving me the feeling of being an individual rather then a number. The front desk staff is very kind and definitely on top of things. When you send them an email in regards to appointments or tests or anything, they are very efficient in getting back that same day or if after hours, you can expect to hear from them first thing the next morning. Dr David is a gem. Such a compassionate, caring Doctor. He is just great to work with and truly listens to all my needs and addresses them accordingly. He is very skilled and knowledgeable with difficult fertility situations. He always made me feel calm and right on track whenever I freaked out about where I was in my fertility journey. He goes above and beyond for his clients. He is a pleasure to work with. His nurse Jessica has been wonderful and caring as well and I appreciate the whole staff of Fifth Avenue Fertility. I can't say enough good things so i will just sum it up with saying, I'm so happy I found themðŸ’œ

originalText.text: I found out about Dr. David from reading his book, Making Babies, and then called his office for a virtual appointment. I appreciated Dr. Davidâ€™s approach from the start of our our appointment. He was kind and caring and sensitive to situations that other doctors had dismissed. Dr. David really took the time to dive into my medical history and looked at other issues that had been overlooked or dismissed by other OBâ€™s. His staff is also kind and compassionate, patiently answering my questions and responding with clear answers to help me better understand everything. I truly appreciate Dr. David and his staff. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I struggled to get pregnant for almost three years, having tried several rounds of IVF and was ready to give up.  Instead I went to see Dr. Sami David who spent over two hours with me and my husband going through our fertility files, medical histories, family histories, lifestyle etc.  After a couple of additional non-invasive tests (that had not been done at our other two doctor's offices) and one treatment (non-IVF) I got pregnant naturally on the first try.  I gave birth to a healthy baby girl two weeks ago.  We are so grateful and overjoyed and can not thank Dr. David and his entire staff enough.  They are all wonderful to work with and have been very responsive through the whole process. After I had my positive pregnancy test, Dr. David and his staff remained very involved, making sure that everything was developing as it should be through the first trimester.  Even after I switched to my OB/GYN, Dr. David and his office have been available to answer any questions and handle any follow up.  I highly recommend that you use Fifth Avenue Fertility if you are struggling to get pregnant.  I wish I had gone to Dr. David first but I am so grateful that eventually we did.

originalText.text: After reading Dr. Davids book "Making babies" I knew I had finally found a doctor that I wanted to work with. He was everything that the previous 3 doctors I met with were not. I found Dr. David to be compassionate, honest, and motivated to help me without pushing me to do invasive and expensive treatments. He tested myself and my husband for problems not thought about from previous clinics I had been to. These test results were extremely helpful in moving forward with treatment. His office staff was efficient and so incredibly easy to work with. I put all my trust into Dr. David and his team and because of that I am happy to say that I have a healthy 5 month old baby girl. Thank you Dr. David! I can't recommend Fifth Avenue Fertility enough!
